amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the ITC by $311,788,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Department of Commerce International Trade Administration Operations account by $311,788,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 263 (Roll no. 270).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 263 (Roll no. 270).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. McClintock.
